term.title: internal energy

item.text: Quantity the change in which is equal to the sum of heat, q, brought to the system and work, w, performed on it, ΔU = q + w. Also called thermodynamic energy.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 957. 'Glossary of terms in quantities and units in Clinical Chemistry (IUPAC-IFCC Recommendations 1996)' on page 976 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668040957)
